items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t find the kind of job he wanted.
I heard someone tell Tom about what happened.
I want to stay in Boston for a few more days.
Tom is just doing what he\'s been told to do.
I think we should consider the problem again.
One of my daughters is married to a Canadian.
One thing I hate about Boston is the traffic.
Tom is the one who showed Mary around Boston.
Tom tried to warn you that this would happen.
Tom usually helps me with this kind of thing.
Tom visited not only Boston but Chicago, too.
Tom is prepared for anything that may happen.
Tom is probably going to go to Boston by car.
Tom is responsible for what happened to Mary.
Tom ran too fast for me to catch up with him.
Tom ran too fast for us to catch up with him.
Tom realized that Mary had been lying to him.
Have you ever thought about moving to Boston?
I thought you said that you didn\'t eat meat.
I thought you said that you didn\'t like Tom.
